sec.p: Covariates were included in the models on the basis of theory and prior research showing that client age [ 45], organizational size [ 60], clinician demographic characteristics (i.e., age, gender, educational level, years of clinical experience, experience in an EBP initiative prior to baseline [ 23]), and clinician attitudes toward EBPs (as measured by the Evidence-Based Practice Attitude Scale (EBPAS) [ 61]) are related to clinicians’ use of psychotherapy techniques [ 23, 62– 65].
